raw_comment: I don't think it's a surprise that richer students have a higher change of getting into their college of choice, with money the parents can give as a "donation" or even just their status alone is enough to set their kid up for success. I feel as long as colleges need donations then rich kids will always have the advantage.
ace_sentences: Some students are richer than other students.
Richer students have a higher chance of getting into their college of choice.
Some parents give money to a college as a donation.
If a parent gives a donation, then the child of the parent has an advantage.
Some parents have a high social status.
If a parent has a high social status, then the child of the parent has an advantage.
If colleges need donations, then rich children will always have an advantage.
